name: getfunctionsbytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool powerbi.
Tool description: The Power BI API offers the Microsoft Power BI news, learning resources, events, samples and other information.
API description: Fetch Power BI DAX functions by topic for a specific page using the provided API key.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.

topic.description: The topic for which to retrieve DAX functions.
